Class StatusBarFooterHandle

  • java.lang.Object
    • guitests.guihandles.NodeHandle<javafx.scene.Node>
      • guitests.guihandles.StatusBarFooterHandle

  • public class StatusBarFooterHandle
extends NodeHandle<javafx.scene.Node>
    A handle for the StatusBarFooter at the footer of the application.

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      java.lang.String getSaveLocation​()
      Returns the text of the 'save location' portion of the status bar.
      java.lang.String getSyncStatus​()
      Returns the text of the sync status portion of the status bar.
      boolean isSaveLocationChanged​()
      Returns true if the current content of the 'save location' is different from the value remembered by the most recent rememberSaveLocation() call.
      boolean isSyncStatusChanged​()
      Returns true if the current content of the sync status is different from the value remembered by the most recent rememberSyncStatus() call.
